title: one or more apertures, excluding doors, with area not less than one- sixth of the floor area of the habitable room, with no part of any habitable room being more than7
clause_text: one or more apertures, excluding doors, with area not less than one- sixth of the floor area of the habitable room, with no part of any habitable room being more than7.50 m away from the source of light and ventilation.However, a staircase shall be deemed to be adequately lighted and ventilated, if it has one or more openings, their area taken together measuring not less than 1 sq. m per landing on the external wall;
